Cons- I'd reccomend buying the game when it's on sale because I think it's a bit overpriced for  5 hours of gameplay.

Оценка: 10/10

Portal 2 is a great puzzle adventure game with original gameplay mechanics, engaging story and amazing level progression. The few characters in the game are well portrayed by great voice acting from the likes of J.K. Simmons and Nolan North. The game is challenging, graphics are lush and beautiful. The co-op multiplayer is so fun you'll never get bored of this game. I Definitely recommend it.

Portal 2 is a great game, a huge improvement since Portal. The story of the game is interesting as is the background story of Aperture Science. The difficulty of the game is alright, not too easy and not too difficult. The synchronization is very well made, incredible job! Co-Op is also pretty good, but not as good as the main story. Can really recommend it.

Portal 2 truley is one of the best puzzle games to ever be realeased. Portal 2 is by far one of the best and most inovative puzzle games I have ever experienced and after beating this game a couple of times on Xbox 360 and then picking up the game from steam and playing the community maps I really feel like this is a great buy and espicaially if you get it during a sale, combined with the original Portal game I promise you will not be dissapointed!

O joguinho massa ,esse jogo saiu perfeito do forno ,foi feito com a mão de deus ,o jogo tem história PERFEITA ,jogabilidade muito boa ,grafícos (NÃO É UM GTA V COM 4K N MAIS SATISFAZ BASTANTE),mais como grafíco n diz a qualidade do jogo ,(EXMPLO SUPER MARIO WORLD),eu joguei o portal 2 por um bom tempo (pelo menos pra min ),joguei bastante COOP,o coop é muito bem feito ,sem a colaboração da dupla não será possível passar as fazes ,eu parei do coop na ultima parte,enfim como padrão de jogos da VALVE ,o jogo é perfeito em todos os fatores ,vale super a pena ,porém ,vc tem que ter cabeça e paciencia ,não é jogo de tiro e sim de puzzle ,na minha opinião ,ficar vendo video no YT ,pra passar das fases é muito paia ,vc perde a graça do jogo ,em ter que resolver os puzzles ,mais sim ,eu admito que eu olhei algumas vezes (eu n tenho paciencia pra resolvar nada msm ,mais tento sempre qu epossível ,recomendadíssimo NOTA 10/10

i love portal 2

Portal 2 is one of the best puzzle games you can buy. It has very simple mechanics with a very nice story and great hummor. It has a Co-op story as well which is very fun to play with a friend who finished the game at least once. If they didn't, you will most likely just give orders to them. After you finish both of the story lines you can find some pretty good community made puzzles for both Singleplayer and Co-op.
Phenomenally well made game with a brilliant story and fun puzzles for a reasonable price.

Portal 2 is an instant recommend. Don't know if I need to say more. Its good. Its amazing. It has been #1 shooter on many game reviews and thats the same for me. The puzzles train your mind and the co-op is a great game with friends. The game is only a few bucks on sale and only $10 not on a sale. Theres about an 8 hour campaign and still places for co-op this game is amazing and im not the only one to say it.

Played this in 2018 and still think it's a masterpiece. Impeccably hilarious dialogue and voice acting and perfect level design. Graphics and art style are impressive for a 7 year old game and frankly, anyone who plays games on a computer must play this game. If it wasn't for Bloodborne and Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain, this would've been my favourite game. 10/10 - Simple story, complex mechanics, hilarious writing and eerie levels.

Valve делает игры хорошо. Среди их игр есть и плохие сами по себе(мы все понимаем, о чём я), но даже они сделаны неплохо. Portal - хорошая игра, сделанная хорошо. Интересная и в меру сложная головоломка и затягивающий сюжет [spoiler] Уитли - редкосная скотина [/spoiler] в сингле, а если у вас есть такой же отбитый друг как и вы, то можно получить кучу фана в coop-кампани(которая, кстати, тоже в меру сложная). Нет, ну что ещё надо? 260р, отличный сингл и интересный кооп!

Топчик, 10/10!

If you liked the original Portal for its atmosphere and subtlety, I'm sorry to say you won't find it here. The tone in Portal 2 is completely different from the original, to the point where I just can't consider it a faithful sequel. The humour has gone from dark and subtle to in-your-face slapstick; Wheatley is probably my least favourite video game character of all time. He, and the Space Core, encapsulate middle-schooler humour perfectly, in particular how screaming incessantly is somehow considered funny. For example, here are a few quotes from Space Core:

What's your favorite thing about space? Mine is space."
"Space going to space can't wait."
"Space. Trial. Puttin' the system on trial. In space. Space system. On trial. Guilty. Of being in space! Going to space jail!"
"Dad! I'm in space! [low-pitched 'space' voice] I'm proud of you, son. [normal voice] Dad, are you space? [low-pitched 'space' voice] Yes. Now we are a family again."
"Space space wanna go to space yes please space. Space space. Go to space."
"Space space going to space oh boy"

Portal 2 could be described as the Chicken McNuggets of video games; edible (enough), heavily processed, and meant for someone with the taste of a 12 year old.

Perfect balance of intuitive controls, fun storyline, engaging game play, good voice acting, challenging puzzles, and a detailed and thoughtfully made game. Instantly became one of my favorites.

Лучшая игра чтобы разрушить любую дружбу...
Единственное чем вы будете заниматься в мультиплеере это:
Отрывать друг другу головы или как их там называют у этих роботов,
Проводить 30 минут - 1,5 часа убивая и издиваясь друг над другом,
Бесится по причине того что, твой друг ставит портал не туда куда надо и в итоге ГладОС похвалит его а не тебя
Офигивать от того что, Ты издиваешься над другом и тебя лишают очков, а его при таких же действиях хвалят.
Думать над головоломками у которых решение легче чем ты мог представить
Ненавидить ГладОС и своего "Лучшего" друга
Оскорблять/Орать на друга

В итоге после прохождения сетевой игры у вас не останется не единой капли Доверия своему другу

amazing, mind-blowing game. although chapter 9 could use some sort of a difficulty spike. I mean, it's the last chapter, and there's barely any way to fail!
